custom-meta.meta-value: The data is available in the R package ‘outbreaks’, and can be accessed in R by typing the three following commands: devtools::install_github("reconhub/outbreaks") library(outbreaks) ?rabies_car_2003 or via the following link: https://github.com/reconhub/outbreaks/blob/master/data/rabies_car_2003.RData.
